item.title: Spiritual Capacity
item.description:
Spiritual Capacity by undefined Michelle Craig, First Counselor in the Young Women General Presidency given in Saturday Morning of 189th Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2019
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Michelle Craig, First Counselor in the Young Women General Presidency
